edu.sru.thangiah.zeus.metaheuristics.tabu
Class TabuSearch

java.lang.Object
  edu.sru.thangiah.zeus.metaheuristics.tabu.TabuSearch
public class TabuSearch
extends java.lang.Object

Title: TabuSearch - a Meta-Heuristic for the Zeus System

Description: The main hub of the Tabu Search implementation responsible for maintaining the Tabu memory structure and used in optimization routines to check for the 'Tabu'ness of proposed operations prior to implementation to break out of local optima.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2003

Company:

Constructor Summary
TabuSearch(DepotLinkedList mainDepots)
          Initialize the Tabu memory structure to match the current solution in Zeus.

Constructor Detail

TabuSearch

public TabuSearch(DepotLinkedList mainDepots)
Initialize the Tabu memory structure to match the current solution in Zeus.

Parameters:
mainDepots - DepotLinkedList of the current solution from Zeus
Method Detail

isTabu

public boolean isTabu(Operation op)
Checks whether a proposed operation is considered a tabu or not.

Parameters:
op - An implementation of the Operation interface containing information about the proposed move.
Returns:
true if the move is not allowed, false if allowed.

getTabuThreshold

public float getTabuThreshold()
Used to find how further from the current solution the operation will be allowed to deviate by tabu search.

Returns:
the percentage allowed to deviate (e.g. 0.10).

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
String representation of the complete Tabu memory structure. Includes information about all levels of Tabu Memory structure hierachy. Warning: The output may be really large if the number of maxOperationsInMemoryPerTruck is high.

Returns:

updateBestSolution

public void updateBestSolution()
Updates the best solution. Solution is updated only if the total cost of the current solution in Zeus is less than the best solution known to tabu search.

getStatistics

public java.lang.String getStatistics()
Retrieves statistics on the performed search.

Returns:
A string containing the information that can printed to the STDOUT or a file.

getBestSolution

public DepotLinkedList getBestSolution()
Returns the best solution known to Tabu Search.

Returns:
Best known solution in the form of a Zeus.DepotLinkedList instance

getCurrentSolution

public DepotLinkedList getCurrentSolution()
Retrieves the current solution from Zeus.

Returns:
Current solution as an instance of Zeus.DepotLinkedList.

updateTime

public void updateTime()
Updates the last accessed time on Tabu Search.

getRunTime

public double getRunTime()
Retrieves the time taken by Tabu Search.

Returns:
The time as a double in milliseconds.

deleteTruck

public void deleteTruck(int depotNo,
                        int truckNo)
Delete a truck from the Tabu Memory structure. Should call updateTruckNo(..) after all required trucks have been deleted, so that the trucks are renumbered.

Parameters:
depotNo - Depot number of depot that this truck belongs to.
truckNo - Truck number of the truck to delete.

deleteDepot

public void deleteDepot(int depotNo)
Delete a depot from the Tabu Memory Structure.

Parameters:
depotNo - Depot number of the depot being deleted.

updateTruckNo

public void updateTruckNo(int depotNo)
Renumbers the trucks in the given the depot, so the numbers start from zero and are in consecutive order.

Parameters:
depotNo - Depot number of the depot in which the trucks need to be renumbered.

updateDepotNo

public void updateDepotNo()
Renumbers the depots in the tabu memory, so the numbers start from one and are in consecutive order.

clearMemory

public void clearMemory()
Clears the Tabu memory of all information about operations, both new and expired. Usually done, when there is a change in the state space.
